entry.title: Part 2 - Boost Your ABAP Productivity with Joule: Generate Unit Tests(AUnits)
entry.content:
Hello enthusiasts, 

The series of blog is constitutes of two parts:

  1. Explain and Find Test-Unfriendly dependencies
  2. Generate Unit Tests(Aunits)

As explained in the part-1 of the blog, Joule currently supports three powerful AI-assisted actions directly inside ADT / IDE:


ExplainUnderstand the code instantly
Find Test-Unfriendly DependenciesIdentify interfaces, DB objects, or classes blocking unit testability
Generate Unit Tests (AUnits)Auto-create ABAP test classes with mocks and test case

This is the part-2 of the blog series, here we are going to understand  one of the most powerful capabilities of Joule in IDE - "Generate Unit Tests".

There are some ways to generate the ABAP Units, Let’s looks at them one-by-one.

Approach 1 - Do a right click on the method you want to generate the Aunit and Joule will propose the Aunit code.

Joule has proposed 2 test methods – Check_m1_valid_data and Check_m1_empty_result

The code is comparing the result with “Valid Result’ and we don’t even have it in our method Check_M1 and the reason  is - Joule does not have the context of the implementation code of CHECK_M1.

Let’s do with the second way.

Approach B - Select the implementation code and ask Joule to explain the code.

This gives the Joule the context about the code and now it becomes better to write Aunits.

Ask to explain in more details like we did in the previous part of the blog.

Give the prompt – Find test-unfriendly dependencies of this method.

Give the prompt to Joule - Generate the ABAP unit for this method with the help of test doubles for the test-unfriendly dependencies.

Here, we go!

Joule has identified mi_data and /ape/if_proc_data~get_proc_data as dependencies.

This is the real power of Joule, it has not just created test methods to cover “Passed” and “failed” cases but also has done an incredible job to create mock data for mi_data.

So, the key is –

  1. Select the code and ask Joule to explain.
  2. Ask to find test dependencies like -   find the test-dependencies of the method check_determine_counter
  3. And then ask Joule to write AUNIT taking test doubles into consideration for the test-dependencies.

Note - There is no standard way of doing this activity, this is my tried and tested way for enriching the code context to Joule and it does a good job. Always make sure to review any generated code or suggestion to finally use in your code.

entry.title: Brazil as One of the Leading Hubs for Artificial Intelligence (2024–2025)
entry.content:
Over the past two years, Brazil has established itself as one of the main Artificial Intelligence (AI) hubs globally, standing out for its combination of public investments, expanding business ecosystem, and regulatory progress. Traditionally a leader in innovation and technology in Latin America, Brazil is now attracting international attention by accelerating the adoption of AI across strategic sectors such as finance, energy, agribusiness, and public services.

In 2024, the Brazilian government launched the Brazilian Artificial Intelligence Plan (PBIA) 2024–2028, a program with an estimated investment of R$ 23 billion dedicated to AI research, development, and infrastructure. The plan aims to strengthen technological sovereignty, foster innovation through universities, and support companies in applying AI to practical use cases, particularly in areas of public interest.

The Main pillars of the PBIA 2024–2028 are:

  • Expansion of AI research and innovation centers;
  • Tax incentives for startups and public–private partnerships;
  • Training and qualification of AI professionals;
  • Implementation of AI in public services (health, security, education).

This initiative positions Brazil as a regional leader in AI policy, ahead of countries like Mexico, Chile, and Argentina.

Brazil’s private sector is undergoing a phase of rapid AI adoption. By 2025, a national survey identified 396 Brazilian AI companies focused on marketing applications, reflecting diversification across generative AI, automation, analytics, and digital services.

According to a Bain & Company (2025) study, 67% of Brazilian companies now consider AI a strategic priority, a major leap from 2024, when only about 12% had active projects. This demonstrates the transition from experimental use to mature, production-level adoption.

Brazil received international investments and technological infrastructure. That's why Brazil’s consolidation as an AI hub also stems from the confidence of major global players. In September 2024, Microsoft announced a US$ 2.7 billion investment in cloud and AI infrastructure in Brazil, one of the largest technology investments in Latin American history. In 2025, Eletrobras partnered with C3 AI to modernize Brazil’s power grid using AI and machine learning, highlighting the industrial applications of advanced technologies.

These moves strengthen Brazil’s position as a regional hub for data and high-performance computing, essential for scaling generative AI and automation initiatives.

Despite major progress, Brazil still faces structural challenges. A SAP Brazil (March 2025) survey revealed that:

  • 29% of companies lack clarity on how to integrate AI into their business systems;
  • 28% cite a shortage of skilled professionals as the main obstacle.

On the regulatory front, Brazil has emerged as a key player. In 2024, the National Data Protection Authority (ANPD) suspended Meta Platforms’ privacy policy, which used Brazilians’ personal data to train generative AI models. This decision marked an important milestone in ethical governance and digital sovereignty, aligning Brazil with European-style data protection principles.

The main sectors driving AI growth in Brazil include:

  • Finance and digital payments: automation and predictive analytics;
  • Energy: smart grids and real-time system optimization;
  • Agribusiness: crop forecasting and climate analytics;
  • Healthcare: assisted diagnostics and telemedicine;
  • Public administration: chatbots and natural language processing for citizen services.

These industries attract investments from both large corporations and local startups, making Brazil a fertile ground for experimentation and innovation.

About the Outlook for 2025 and Beyond the trends indicate continued expansion of generative AI and process automation in Brazilian companies. By the end of 2025, it is expected that:

  • Over 60% of corporate AI solutions in Brazil will involve generative models;
  • The country will consolidate international research and training partnerships;
  • The General Artificial Intelligence Law (under discussion in Congress) will advance the national governance framework.

With growing public and private investments, Brazil is on track to become a Latin American reference in AI innovation and ethics, combining economic growth with responsible technological governance.

The 2024–2025 period marks a strategic turning point for AI in Brazil, shifting from an emerging topic to a core pillar of industrial and business competitiveness. The alignment between government vision, international investments, and technological maturity positions Brazil as one of the leading AI hubs in the Southern Hemisphere, with the potential to export technology, talent, and regulatory best practices.

At MakeValue, we develop AI-powered applications for SAP Finance, focused on enhancing financial visibility and decision-making. Our Cash Flow Intelligence App leverages data from Supply Chain, Sales, Treasury, Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, and real-time Bank Balances to deliver accurate forecasting and scenario simulation, ensuring that financial teams have a clear, data-driven view of their company’s liquidity at any time.

Is your company already exploring AI implementation projects? In which sectors or business processes are you seeing the greatest potential for transformation?

References

  • Reuters: Microsoft to invest $2.7 billion in Brazil
  • Reuters: Brazil proposes $4 billion AI investment plan
  • SAP News Brazil (2025): Brazil leads in AI adoption among enterprises
  • Bain & Company (2025): Artificial Intelligence Adoption Survey
  • Instituto IA – LNCC (2024–2025): Mapping of AI Research Groups in Brazil
  • Poder360 (2024): Brazil to become Latin America’s AI hub with R$ 22 billion by 2028

entry.title: Join the SAP Enterprise Support Day and Elevate Your Business Transformation!
entry.content:
Hello fellow support enthusiasts, 

The annual SAP Enterprise Support Day (November 12-13, 2025) is around the corner! – your gateway to unlocking the full potential of SAP’s support experience. This global virtual event is tailored to help you accelerate your digital business transformation journeys with confidence. Centered around the evolving deliverables of SAP Enterprise Support, the event highlights SAP’s latest innovations in AI-driven support, smart self-services, and integrated toolchains that simplify operations and reduce downtime. 

The event fosters a collaborative environment where insights and transformation strategies converge, reflecting SAP’s vision for a seamless customer journey across its cloud and suite solutions.

Click here to see your personal message by Stefan Steinle, EVP and Head of Customer Support & Cloud Lifecycle Management at SAP SE.: 

 

Through a series of expert-led sessions offered in multiple languages and time zones, you will gain a deeper understanding of how to elevate your business transformation. 

  • November 12, 2025 I 1 p.m. EST (Spanish, Portuguese, English) 
  • November 13, 2025 I 1 p.m. SGT (Chinese, Japanese, English) 
  • November 13, 2025 I 1 p.m. CET (German, English) 

What can you expect? 

  • Transformative Support Experience: 
    Discover how SAP’s preventative support shifts from reactive to proactive, enhancing customer satisfaction and reducing downtime. 
  • AI-Enabled Processing:  
    Learn how AI simplifies support across cloud and suite landscapes, enabling faster resolutions and seamless access via SAP for Me. 
  • Confidence Across the SAP Journey: 
    Explore onboarding strategies that unlock value and build trust throughout the SAP lifecycle, boosting confidence in the SAP Business Suite. 
  • Accelerated Transformation:  
    Gain actionable insights into how SAP’s integrated toolchain empowers you to drive innovation and speed up their transformation journey. 

Here you can find the detailed agenda!  

Register today and don’t miss this opportunity to gain fresh perspectives and practical insights that will empower your business transformation. This is your opportunity to learn, connect, and take actionable steps toward optimizing your SAP solutions.  

Please spread the word and share the invitation with your teams. 

If you need any support, please reach out to the event organization team. 

We look forward to seeing you at the SAP Enterprise Support Day. 

Kind regards, 

Your SAP Enterprise Support Day Organization Team

entry.title: Germany CSD Oct 28th – Joule for SAP Ariba & Fieldglass is here, get prepared to leverage it!
entry.content:
Joule SAP Copilot is now available for Spend Management, with initial skills released in Q3 and additional enhancements expected in Q4 and 2026*. Are you prepared to activate these new features?

Furthermore, SAP Ariba and Fieldglass solutions include embedded AI capabilities that can be enabled now.

If you are attending Oct 28th Customer Success Day – Spend Management in Garching I invite you to join the “Joule & AI: Configuration & Prerequisites” workshop at 15:30 to gain a comprehensive overview of Joule enablement steps.

I will also be present throughout the full day event and available to discuss further during networking breaks.

In the meantime, please review the following informative blogs on this topic:

  • Unlocking the Potential of SAP AI in Procurement
  • Joule in SAP Ariba Applications
  • Configure Single-Sign-On for SAP Ariba with SAP Cloud Identity Services

Why to Attend This Session?

  • Stay Ahead of the Curve: Get the first look at Joule—the new SAP AI Copilot—and its skills for SAP Ariba and SAP Fieldglass.
  • Unified Experience Across SAP Solutions: Learn how Cloud Identity Services streamline authentication for your users, delivering a secure and harmonious login experience.
  • Unlock Embedded AI: See how AI capabilities are already working behind the scenes in SAP Ariba Category Management, Guided Sourcing, Guided Buying, and SAP Fieldglass.
  • Direct Access to Experts: Register for Customer Drop-in Sessions to dive deeper, ask questions, and get personalized support for your journey.

Who Should Attend?
If you are a procurement professional, IT leader, business analyst, or simply passionate about digital transformation, this session will bring you fresh insights and hands-on guidance. Come with your questions and your curiosity.

Let’s unlock what’s possible with AI for SAP Ariba and Fieldglass—see you in Garching!

entry.title: Everything You Need to Know About SAP Discovery Center Before TechEd
entry.content:
SAP TechEd 2025 is approaching—the premier annual event for SAP developers, solution architects, and IT professionals worldwide. With thousands of sessions, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities waiting for you, success at TechEd depends on how well-prepared you arrive. That's where the SAP Discovery Center's latest updates come in. 

From a comprehensive SAP AI Return-On-Investment (ROI) calculator that provides real-time financial justification for AI packages to an enhanced SAP BTP Guidance Framework that serves as your star map to best practices, these updates, these updates directly address the challenges you face every day: proving value, reducing implementation risk, and accelerating digital transformation timelines.

Whether you're a solution architect planning your next SAP Business Technology Platform implementation, a developer exploring AI possibilities, or an IT leader who needs to justify technology investments with hard numbers, the new SAP Discovery Center features will become your most valuable pre-TechEd preparation. Let's dive into what's new, why it matters, and how you can leverage these tools to maximize your TechEd experience and drive immediate value back to your organization.

AI on SAP Discovery Center

1. Enhanced AI Catalogue: Your Complete AI Solution Navigator

The SAP Business AI Catalogue has received a major upgrade that transforms how you explore and evaluate AI solutions. The catalogue now features dedicated categories for "Joule" and "AI Agent", making it easier than ever to find the specific AI capabilities you need for your organization.

Major Enhancements:

  • The catalogue now reflects SAP's new per-user-per-month commercial model, providing transparent pricing visibility
  • AI packages that bundle AI agents and features alongside consumption-based AI agents and features for flexible implementation options
  • Comma-separated value (CSV) export functionality allows you to download the entire AI catalogue for offline analysis, team sharing, and integration with your procurement processes

🔗Explore the enhanced AI Catalogue: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/ai-catalog/

 

2. Streamlined Discovery with Intelligent Filtering

The completely redesigned filters improve the experience of searching through SAP Discovery Center’s AI offerings. The updated interface and enhanced look-and-feel make finding relevant offerings faster and more efficient.

Key Improvements:

  • Smart filters help you pinpoint AI offerings that match your specific use cases, industry, and technical requirements
  • At-a-glance information on catalogue cards provides essential details without requiring deep navigation
  • Improved user experience that reduces time-to-insight and accelerates your AI exploration journey

 

3. ROI-Driven Decision Making with the AI Estimator

The new Return-on-Investment (ROI) calculation feature added to the AI Estimator transforms how organizations evaluate and justify AI investments. With the ROI estimation, users can make more informed decisions on AI packages and consumption-based AI offerings.

Game-Changing Capabilities:

  • Real-time ROI calculations for both AI packages and consumption-based AI offerings
  • Transparent methodology that explains how ROI estimates are calculated, building confidence in your investment decisions
  • Business case support that provides the financial justification needed for executive approval and budget allocation

🔗Calculate your AI ROI: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/ai-estimator-v1

 

4. Integrated AI and SAP BTP Service Connections

The enhanced SAP BTP Service Catalogue with clear linkage between AI offerings and SAP BTP services now shows exactly which AI offerings relate to specific services, providing comprehensive visibility into how AI capabilities can amplify your existing SAP BTP investments.

Revolutionary Features:

  • Direct AI offering visibility within SAP BTP service detail pages eliminates the guesswork in finding relevant AI capabilities
  • Improved use case planning and implementation by understanding how AI can enhance your existing SAP BTP services, and with clear connections between the AI foundation and AI capabilities

🔗Explore integrated AI offerings: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/serviceCatalog/sap-build-process-automation?region=all&tab=relatedaiofferings

Other Updates on SAP Discovery Center

1. SAP BTP Guidance Framework: Your Star Map for Guidance Assets

The new SAP BTP Guidance Framework is a resource that extends the scope for architects by providing comprehensive methodologies and guidance. This framework serves as your guide toward architecting, developing, and deploying enterprise-grade solutions on SAP BTP.

What Makes This Framework Essential:

  • Structured adoption phases provide clear direction and a proven approach for adopting SAP BTP according to industry best practices
  • Tailored recommendations drive your organization's SAP BTP maturity through an integrated maturity assessment
  • Strategic decision support helps you make the right decisions at the right time, maximizing value from your SAP BTP investments
  • Comprehensive guidance covers everything from initial planning to advanced enterprise implementations

This framework is particularly valuable for SAP TechEd attendees who want to move beyond tactical implementations to strategic, enterprise-scale SAP BTP adoption.

🔗Access the BTP Guidance Framework: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/guidance-framework

 

2.  Events: Expanding the SAP Discovery Center Knowledge Universe

The SAP Discovery Center homepage now features a dedicated Events section. This new section serves as a centralized resource for hands-on events designed for both SAP customers and partners, adding another dimension to the Discovery Center's comprehensive learning ecosystem.

Partner and Customer Benefits:

  • Hands-on learning opportunities help customers and partners deepen their knowledge and enhance their technical skills
  • Knowledge transfer that benefits the entire ecosystem by making expertise more accessible to all audiences
  • Networking opportunities connect partners with SAP experts and fellow practitioners
  • Customer value enhancement through access to more knowledgeable, qualified partners
  • Ecosystem strengthening by making partner enablement more visible and accessible
  • Accelerated adoption through joint events that align partner capabilities with customer needs and use cases

🔗Discover events: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/index.html#

 

3.  Latest Mission Releases: Learning That Drives Results

The SAP Discovery Center continues to expand its use case portfolio with five new missions that address the most pressing enterprise challenges:

🚀Activate Joule with SAP Integrated Business Planning (IBP)
🚀Setup of Joule in Mobile Start
🚀Accelerate Smart Supplier Selection with Retrieval-Augmented Generative AI
🚀Migrate data from SAP Business One to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
🚀Accelerate your BTP Journey with FRE Acceleration Datasphere Pack

These hands-on experiences provide practical, implementable knowledge that bridges the gap between theoretical understanding and real-world application, ensuring both partners and customers can immediately leverage cutting-edge SAP technologies.

How Missions Guide Your Journey: 

  • Hands-on learning experiences that provide practical skills through guided, interactive tutorials and real-world scenarios
  • Self-paced exploration allows partners and customers to learn at their own speed and revisit content as needed
  • Comprehensive skill development covering beginner to advanced topics across SAP's entire technology portfolio
  • Immediate practical application with step-by-step guidance that can be implemented directly in production environments  
  • Reduced learning curve for new SAP technologies through expert-designed tutorials and best practices

🔗 Explore all new missions: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/missioncatalog

 

SAP Business Technology Platform – Priority Use Cases

Explore the comprehensive range of SAP Business Technology Platform use cases that these missions support here:

🔗https://www.sap.com/products/technology-platform/use-cases.html?sort=latest_desc

 

Your Next Steps

As you prepare for SAP TechEd 2025, think of these tools as your spacecraft's vital systems: the ROI Calculator as your fuel efficiency monitor, ensuring every investment delivers maximum propulsion; the SAP BTP Guidance Framework as your star maps, guiding you safely through complex architectural decisions; and the Events as your communication array, keeping you connected with the broader SAP ecosystem of knowledge and expertise.

The countdown to SAP TechEd has begun. Your mission parameters are set. These SAP Discovery Center updates aren't just features—they're your launch sequence for achieving breakthrough results. Whether you're embarking on your first SAP BTP expedition or you're a seasoned space traveller ready for advanced AI exploration, you now have everything needed for a successful mission.

 

Ready for liftoff to transform your SAP journey?

  • Register now and start building your agenda
  • Connect with us on social media for real-time updates
  • Join the conversation using #SAPTechEd2025

In the next blog, we will discuss our recommended sessions for your SAP TechEd agenda in more detail.

Don't just attend SAP TechEd 2025—make it the catalyst for your next breakthrough.

entry.title: SAP’s New Logistics Management Module: A Cloud-Native Approach to Smarter Regional Supply Chains
entry.content:
At SAP Connect 2025 in Los Angeles, SAP unveiled a number of innovations in the supply chain space and one of the most notable is SAP Logistics Management, a new cloud-native solution designed to streamline and unify logistics operations  across warehouses, transportation, and logistics partners.

This launch reflects SAP’s strategy to simplify logistics for distributed and regional operations while enabling real-time visibility, automation, and collaboration across the supply chain network.

In this blog post, I will take you through what the module is, what its capabilities are, how it fits into the SAP ecosystem, and what it means for companies looking to modernise their logistics operations and all within one intelligent cloud platform.

Read the full blog to explore features, business impact, and practical steps to prepare your logistics operations for the next generation of SAP innovation.

What Is SAP Logistics Management?

SAP Logistics Management is a modern SaaS-based logistics solution built on the SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP).
It brings together warehousing, transportation management, and partner collaboration in a single, integrated system — particularly suited for regional or satellite operations  while connecting seamlessly with SAP Cloud ERP and SAP Business Network.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Image Source: SAP Product Information Page (sap.com)

Key Attributes

  • Cloud-native: Designed for seamless scalability, continuous innovation, and rapid deployment.
  • Unified logistics approach: Combines warehouse, transport execution, orchestration, and partner collaboration into one platform.
  • Native ERP integration: Connects easily with SAP Cloud ERP and SAP S/4HANA without heavy customisation.
  • Carrier & partner collaboration: Built-in connectivity through the SAP Business Network for real-time visibility and data sharing.
  • AI-powered operations (Joule): Leverages SAP Joule AI assistants to automate tasks, guide decisions, and reduce manual workload.

In short, SAP Logistics Management doesn’t replace heavy-duty logistics systems like SAP EWM or SAP TM, but rather extends SAP’s portfolio with a lighter, agile, intelligent logistics layer ideal for regional warehouses and distributed networks.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Image Source: SAP Product Information Page (sap.com)

Core Capabilities & Business Impact

 

Function

Business Impact

Warehouse & transport execution

Reduces manual coordination and errors

Real-time visibility

Enables proactive decision-making

Dock & appointment scheduling

Improves yard efficiency

AI-guided automation

Speeds up repetitive tasks

Integrated partner collaboration

Boosts transparency across the supply chain

 

Feature Highlights

Feature Area

What It Enables

Why It Matters

Warehouse execution

Pick/pack, wave management, dock scheduling, inventory movements

Smooth internal operations, less idle time

Transportation & dispatching

Route planning, dispatching, and execution

Better shipment coordination

Network collaboration

Real-time status, carrier integration, partner communication

Reduces blind spots, accelerates response

Appointment & dock scheduling

Dock/gate management

Reduces queuing, improves yard efficiency

AI automation (Joule)

Decision support, task automation

Frees up planners and boosts productivity

ERP integration

Out-of-the-box connectivity with SAP Cloud ERP

Minimizes custom development

Scalable deployment

Rapid implementation for smaller logistics nodes

Supports multi-tier logistics networks

 

Positioning Within the SAP Ecosystem

SAP positions this module as a bridge for distributed logistics operations, extending logistics capabilities to smaller or regional nodes. It complements, not replaces the SAP Extended Warehouse Management and SAP Transportation Management .

Where It Fits:

SAP Product

Complexity

Ideal For

Deployment

SAP EWM

High

Central hubs

On-prem / Cloud

SAP TM

High

Complex transport networks

On-prem / Cloud

SAP Logistics Management

Medium / Low

Regional / Satellite nodes

Cloud-native

Because it’s built on SAP BTP and integrates with SAP Business Network and Joule AI, the new module aligns with SAP’s vision of an intelligent, integrated supply chain.
SAP announced that general availability is expected in Q1 2026.

Benefits & Business Value

Adopting SAP Logistics Management can deliver both operational and strategic gains:

  1. Reduced operational friction: Unified logistics reduces manual handoffs and integration gaps.
  2. Faster deployment for regional nodes: Cloud-native architecture enables quicker rollouts and lower implementation costs.
  3. Improved visibility & collaboration: Real-time tracking and partner integration enhance transparency and agility.
  4. AI-driven decision support: Joule AI assists planners, automates routine actions, and reduces human error.
  5. Scalable, modular growth: Deploy gradually across logistics nodes without disrupting existing core systems.
  6. Resilient and agile operations: Respond faster to disruptions and maintain consistent service levels.
  7. Network consistency: Standardised processes and data across multiple logistics layers ensure global alignment.

Key Challenges & Considerations

While promising, success depends on thoughtful execution.
Organisations should anticipate and plan for:

  • Scope & complexity limits: The module is optimised for low-to-medium complexity; large hubs may still need EWM + TM.
  • Data integration & master data quality: Consistent, clean master data is critical for seamless performance.
  • Change management: AI-driven workflows require user adoption and training.
  • Phased rollout strategy: Identify pilot nodes and migration paths carefully.
  • Carrier & partner readiness: True collaboration depends on network adoption.
  • Monitoring & exception handling: Maintain human oversight during early automation phases.
  • Cost vs. ROI alignment: Evaluate expected efficiency gains against investment costs.

 

What Businesses Should Do Next

If your organization already runs SAP Cloud ERP or S/4HANA, this launch presents a real opportunity to modernise logistics without starting from scratch.

Recommended Next Steps

  • Map your logistics footprint: Identify which regional or satellite nodes would benefit most.
  • Start with pilot deployments: Test configurations, training, and ROI in smaller sites.
  • Ensure data readiness: Clean up and harmonize master data across materials, locations, and partners.
  • Engage carriers early: Align carriers and logistics partners with the collaboration network from the start.
  • Plan coexistence: Integrate with existing EWM/TM during the transition phase.
  • Adopt AI in stages: Roll out automation features gradually and monitor outcomes.
  • Track KPIs from day one: Measure order throughput, dock utilisation, exception rates, and on-time delivery.

Conclusion 

The introduction of SAP Logistics Management marks a pivotal step in SAP’s supply chain evolution - moving toward networked, intelligent, and modular logistics.

With its cloud-native architecture, AI-powered automation, and embedded collaboration, it offers a compelling value proposition for companies with multi-tier logistics footprints.

Ultimately, success will depend on data readiness, partner engagement, and phased adoption but for organisations ready to embrace intelligent logistics, SAP is clearly paving the way for smarter, more connected supply chains.

Thank you for reading.

entry.title: [Session Reply & Slides Available] Hot Topic: Joule Activation for SAP Cloud ERP (Public Edition)
entry.content:
SAP S/4HANA Cloud Expertise Service Team and SAP AI RIG team recently co-present a deep-dive session focused on enabling ‌Joule‌ - SAP’s generative AI copilot - for SAP Cloud ERP.

The agenda covered as below and feel free to access [Slides] [Recording]. 

  • Business AI capabilities and use cases
  • Joule’s technical architecture on SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP)
  • Step-by-step activation process for S/4HANA Public Cloud
  • Q&A and live troubleshooting

1. Key Objectives‌

  • Demonstrate Joule’s value in streamlining business processes (e.g., sales order management, issue resolution in status check).
  • Guide participants through end-to-end setup using BTP booster, destinations, and identity management.
  • Equip partners to deploy Joule for customers with minimal friction.

2. Business AI & Joule Introduction‌

Joule Definition‌
  • SAP’s generative AI copilot embedded in cloud solutions to automate tasks, provide contextual insights, and reduce manual effort.
Primary Use Case‌:
  • Navigational support (e.g., finding apps without memorizing transaction codes)
  • Transactional support (e.g., creating insights cards, resolving incomplete sales orders)
  • Informational support (e.g., find SAP Help document for relevant business process)
Demo Highlight
  • Create Insights Cards with Joule
  • Check Sales Order Status with Joule‌:Joule identifies incomplete orders, highlights missing fields (e.g., payment terms), and guides users to resolve issues

3. Technical Architecture & Activation Flow‌

3.1 Core Components‌:

  • Joule Web Client‌ is embedded across SAP cloud solutions (e.g., SuccessFactors, S/4HANA)
  • BTP Subaccount‌
    • Hosts Joule instance
    • SAP Build Work Zone
    • connectivity services
  • Cloud Identity Services‌
    • Manages authentication (IAS)
    • Identity / role synchronization (IPS)
  • S/4HANA Cloud APIs‌: Data source for Joule’s responses.

3.2 Activation Steps‌:

Prerequisites‌:
  • BTP global account with Joule entitlements
  • S/4HANA system registered to BTP
BTP Subaccount Setup‌:
  • Create subaccount in preferred region/hyperscaler
  • Assign entitlements:
    • SAP Build Work Zone (foundation or standard edition)
    • Joule service
  • Establish trust to Cloud Identity Services tenant
  • Add S/4HANA domain to trusted destinations
Joule Booster Execution‌:
  • Guided setup for BTP formations.
  • Integrate S/4HANA, Build Work Zone, and Cloud Identity Services
Post-Booster Configurations‌:
  • Verify communication arrangements in S/4HANA (e.g., Digital Assistant Service - 0882).
  • Verify BTP Destinations
  • Verify SAP Build Work Zone Content for S/4HANA
  • Configure Identity Provisioning (IPS) to sync users/roles from S/4HANA to Build Work Zone
Validation‌:
  • Ensure Joule icon appears in S/4HANA Launchpad.
  • Test capabilities (e.g., querying open sales orders).

4. Critical Notes & Pitfalls‌

  • Trust Configuration‌: Ensure all solutions in a Joule formation use the ‌same Cloud Identity Services tenant‌.
  • Destination Errors‌: Verify hostnames, client IDs, and secrets in navigation service manually if not auto-generated.
  • Identity Provisioning‌: Ensure IPS jobs run successfully to propagate roles to SAP Build Work Zone.

5. Next Steps & Resources‌

Discovery Center Missions:
  1. https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/missiondetail/4538/4826/
  2. https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/missiondetail/4452/4738/
Support Channels‌:
  • SAP Community - Business AI 
  • SAP Support for technical errors.
Upcoming Sessions‌:
  • Implement SAP Business AI for SAP Cloud ERP (Oct 27th)
  • Vietnam localization for implementation (Oct 28th)

entry.title: Exciting UX talks at TechEd – Virtual, or meet us in Berlin and On The Road (USA, India, Australia)
entry.content:
For TechEd 2025 we have an exciting agenda lined up for all of you interested in SAP user experience. We not only have many interesting talks and hands-on sessions for creators (designer and developers) but also some talks showing our strategy and latest innovations for end users – which hopefully will inspire you when creating your own applications!

With TechEd Virtual, you can watch some of these talks from wherever you are around the world. Here’s an overview of the talks which are primarily relevant for user experience, starting with TechEd Virtual, and then moving on to the individual locations.

For TechEd Virtual, Berlin and Bangalore: the main sub-tracks to look out for are:

  • Product and User Experience,
    in the Cloud Application (CA) track.
  • AI-driven user experiences with SAP Build,

TechEd On Tour USA

entry.title: AI-innovations in SAP Cloud ERP Private 2025
entry.content:
The release of SAP Cloud ERP Private 2025 marks a significant leap forward in enterprise automation and intelligence, as presented in this product blog by @BeSchulze. This release, the result of two years of focused development, places artificial intelligence at the core – seamlessly integrated across business areas to redefine how work gets done.

Central to this update is the new agentic AI framework, where task-specific agents work together under the orchestration of our copilot Joule. More than just assistance, SAP’s persona-based AI acts as the new interface – guiding users through processes, answering questions, and delivering relevant insights within the tools they use every day. Customers can now experience improved transparency, faster decision-making, and simplified operations, with intelligent capabilities integrated directly into their business flow.

Dive into the accompanying video for a glimpse of how these AI-driven capabilities are transforming daily work and setting a new benchmark for enterprise management.

 

 

Agentic Use cases

Asset Management: Maintenance Planner

In the area of Asset Management, planning maintenance activities often requires seamless access to the right tools at the right time. The Maintenance Planner feature, newly integrated with Joule, enhances this process by providing direct navigation to scheduling applications within SAP S/4HANA Asset Management. This innovation means that maintenance planners no longer need to sift through catalogs, as they can intuitively access relevant apps directly from their conversations, such as asking, "How to visualize maintenance work?" and receiving immediate links to resource scheduling applications. By embedding SAP Help documentation into Joule’s conversational responses, planners gain quick insights and can focus more on optimally scheduling maintenance tasks, thus ensuring that assets are well-managed without the hassle of navigation detours.

Eager to learn more? Check out our SAP Help Portal and watch the demo video below.

 

 

Finance: Simpliyfying invoice dispute with the dispute manager

Untangling an incorrect invoice can feel like detective work, searching for clues across different systems. Now, with the Dispute Manager agent in SAP Cloud ERP Private your finance team has a new partner. A finance expert can simply ask Joule to pull up a dispute case by its number or show recent invoices for a customer. From that single conversation, they can review the details and then instruct Joule to either reject the dispute or navigate them directly to the app to create a credit note. This conversational approach turns a complex, multi-step investigation into a streamlined and guided dialogue. It not only saves valuable time for your team but also leads to quicker resolutions, helping maintain positive customer relationships.

For more information, please refer to the SAP Help Portal.

 

Finance: Empowering Trade Classification with an AI Agent  

Imagine trying to import a new fitness tracker and facing a complex web of customs classifications, where one wrong choice could mean costly delays. The Joule Agent for Trade Classification in SAP Cloud ERP Private 2025 makes this task straightforward by analyzing your product's data against global customs rules. For example, it might conclude a fitness tracker falls under the wristwatches category and provide legal notes to back this decision, keeping your team informed and in control. By transforming the complex classification process into a guided interaction, your trade professionals have more time to focus on strategy rather than paperwork. This not only enhances the speed and accuracy of your compliance processes but also strengthens your ability to meet market demands swiftly. With this AI innovation, your business can confidently and efficiently pursue global growth, minimizing delays and maximizing opportunities.

To learn more, consult our SAP Help Portal and watch the demo video below.

 

 

Sales LoB

Elevating sales efficiency with AI-driven solution quotation management

Speaking of the Sales line of business, where time is of the essence, managing solution quotations can be a complex task. The introduction of Joule as a digital assistant in SAP Cloud ERP Private 2025 simplifies this process by allowing sales reps to execute tasks like creation, updating, and searching of solution quotations with conversational, natural language commands. This empowers sales teams to focus on high-value opportunities, such as quotations about to expire or those with significant client interest, and make well-informed decisions with clarity and speed. By streamlining the access to critical information, Joule helps reduce operational time and enhances the agility of sales professionals, allowing them to concentrate on building stronger customer relationships and fulfilling sales targets.

 

 

For more information read our dedicated pages on performing release and acceptance of solution quotations and fetching solution quotation information.

 

Seamlessly creating billing documents with AI

Imagine transforming the intricate process of billing document creation into an efficient, effortless operation—this is where Joule steps in. The AI-powered capabilities of Joule allow users to effortlessly generate billing documents, whether they stem from a single reference or a collection of sales and delivery documents. This intuitive system supports the creation of both individual and collective billing documents, tailored to meet diverse business needs with pinpoint accuracy. For R&D departments, this means a streamlined workflow where administrative overhead is minimized, allowing more focus on innovation and product development. By simplifying navigation and enabling quick access to essential apps like Display Billing Documents, Joule enhances the accuracy and efficiency of billing processes, paving the way for more strategic decision-making. With this kind of intelligent assistance, your team spends less time on the nitty-gritty and more time driving the business forward.

 For more details, consult the SAP Help Portal.

 

Sourcing & Procurement LoB

AI-assisted creation of purchase requisitions 

Let’s take a look at the Sourcing & Procurement Line of Business. In this area creating purchase requisitions is a task that demands accuracy and efficiency. With the AI-assisted capabilities of Joule, the process becomes intuitive, allowing users, particularly casual ones, to navigate and complete requisitions merely through conversational prompts. This smart assistance helps in understanding various languages, correcting misspelled data, and even suggesting sources of supply promptly, thereby minimizing manual overhead and enhancing speed in decision-making. By embracing the future potential of speech recognition, Joule promises to make procurement tasks even more seamless, supporting operational purchasers in reducing free text entries and ensuring order clarity.

 For more details, refer to SAP Help Portal.

 

Finance LoB

Simplified subscription order management*

In Finance, is often fragmented and error-prone. Teams spend valuable time reconciling contracts, processing changes, and ensuring compliance - effort that slows down financial operations and puts transparency at risk.

Joule tackles this challenge by simplifying subscription management end to end. It guides users through creating orders, automatically filling key fields once core details are entered. Contract information is easy to access and aligned with attributes like customer or product ID, while intuitive summaries provide quick snapshots of activation status. By streamlining these steps, Joule boosts efficiency, improves transparency, and allows businesses to focus on growth rather than administrative tasks.

 

For more information, consult the SAP Help Portal.  

 

Joule for cash management assistant*

Picture your finance team, once bogged down in manual cash flow tracking, now effortlessly navigating a sea of numbers with ease. With Joule, you can quickly verify if due bank statements are received, fetch opening balances, and factor in expected cash flows, all in one seamless process. By providing accurate calculations of expected closing balances, Joule proactively alerts you to potential cash shortages or surpluses. This efficiency not only saves substantial time but also empowers you to optimize cash usage strategically. In a world where timing is everything, having this level of clarity allows your business to maintain a robust financial footing and seize opportunities as they arise. 

 

 

For more details, refer to the SAP Help Portal. 

*planned availability in November 2025  with the  update of Joule framework

Supply Chain LoB

Joule navigation in SAP Fiori apps for extended warehouse management

In managing warehouse operations, finding the right tools quickly can make all the difference between seamless or sluggish performance. With the introduction of Joule copilot navigation in SAP Fiori apps for extended warehouse management, SAP Cloud ERP Private 2025 enhances user experience by guiding employees effortlessly to the most suitable applications for their tasks. This AI-driven assistance not only accelerates warehouse processes but also minimizes the need for extensive user training, ensuring employees can focus on their core responsibilities rather than app navigation. The real value lies in the comprehensive insights this innovation provides, empowering users to make informed decisions that enhance efficiency across operations.

 Eager to learn more? Consult our SAP Help Portal.

 

Service Management LoB

Creating follow-ups for in-house service objects with Joule

Now let’s have a look at the Service Management LoB. Here, Joule's AI-driven capabilities enable service managers to easily search, display, and create follow-ups for in-house service objects using conversational interactions. This human-centric approach optimizes daily tasks by allowing managers to seamlessly access critical information and act upon it without the need for complex navigation. By streamlining these processes, service management teams can focus on what truly matters—delivering quality service to their customers. Such enhancements in task efficiency lead to more responsive service operations, ensuring a proactive approach toward managing service demands.

 

 

For more information, refer to SAP Help Portal.

 

Research and Development LoB

Intelligent project assistant capabilities with Joule

Navigating through a sea of data is commonplace in Research and Development (R&D) area, yet it doesn't have to be a drain on your team's creativity and productivity. The intelligent project assistant capabilities powered by Joule allow users to derive project data through natural language inquiries without the hassle of navigating multiple applications. This ease of access aids in quickly retrieving updates on project changes, identifying missing parts, and tracking due activities, all through Joule’s conversational interface. By supporting informational, navigational, and transactional capabilities, Joule transforms project management into a streamlined process, helping teams stay focused on innovation rather than administrative tasks. Moreover, the ability to open projects and WBS elements directly through Joule means that users can engage with their data more efficiently, fostering a productive and satisfied work environment. With these enhancements, businesses can ensure that their R&D projects are not only well managed but also effectively advancing toward their goals.

 

Navigating Bill of Materials with Joule

Imagine a workspace, where accessing Bill of Materials (BoM) is as straightforward as asking a colleague for the latest update, that's the seamless interaction Joule brings to the table. This AI-assisted natural language capability supports end users in navigating and managing BoM scenarios with ease, removing previous barriers to information. With Joule, users can effortlessly access header information, query BoMs by material-plant combinations, and select specific items, all through simple conversational prompts. Such simplification boosts productivity, allowing R&D teams to devote more time to product innovation and less to administrative navigation. By transforming BoM management into an intuitive, efficient process, Joule empowers users to make informed decisions, enhancing operational efficiency and ultimately driving business success.

For more information, refer to the SAP Help Portal.

 

AI-Enabled Precision in Handling Change Records

In Research and Development, managing change records is often time-consuming and complex. Teams must sift through detailed information, track overdue items, and ensure compliance – all of which takes attention away from innovation.

Imagine handling change records as effortlessly as discussing project milestones with your team – this is the transformative experience Joule brings to R&D operations. Joule simplifies interactions around change records, offering users intuitive access to detailed information at both header and item levels. By expediting the summarization process and enabling status changes, Joule ensures that overdue change records are discovered and addressed promptly, promoting efficient workflow and compliance. The capability to find records based on criteria such as product and reason for change further streamlines the management process, enabling teams to focus on innovation rather than paperwork. With these enhancements, R&D departments can make informed decisions more swiftly, driving their projects forward with the confidence that change management is both smooth and reliable.

 

For more details, refer to the dedicated pages on summarizing change record information and fetching change record information.

 

Enterprise Portfolio and Project Management

Streamlined project financials with Joule’s AI assistance

Handling complex financial data is one of the biggest hurdles in Enterprise Portfolio and Project Management. Now, picture managing a multifaceted project with the ease of a friendly chat – that’s the vision Joule brings to life. With enhanced project assistant capabilities, Joule enables users to seamlessly access project financial and master data through intuitive natural language interactions. Gone are the days of toggling through applications and complex reports; now, project system users can effortlessly retrieve and summarize financial insights, aligning their focus on high-value tasks. This AI-driven ease not only boosts user satisfaction but also streamlines data collection and consolidation, making project management more efficient and effective. As a result, project teams can better navigate financial landscapes, ensuring that each decision supports the strategic vision. By leveraging Joule’s summarization and analytical prowess, organizations can enhance precision in project financial control, translating insights into impactful actions.


For more information, refer to SAP Help Portal. 

 

Summary

As we have explored, the SAP Cloud ERP Private 2025 release introduces a transformative suite of AI-driven innovations that redefine what’s possible in enterprise operations. By harnessing the power of specialized agentic AI and Joule, businesses are now equipped to navigate complexities with clarity and precision, leading to optimized processes and strategic growth. We’re excited for you to experience these advancements firsthand and to see how they can empower your organization to achieve its goals with new-found efficiency and insight. Thank you for joining us on this journey through the future of intelligent enterprise solutions. Stay connected for more updates by following the with the PSCC_Enablement tag as we continue to innovate and shape the path forward for businesses worldwide. Don't forget to follow me (@Yannick_PTT) in the community as well as on LinkedIn to not miss any updates and insights.

For more information on intelligent capabilities integrated SAP Cloud ERP Private, explore the SAP Help Portal. 

More information

  • What’s New Viewer
  • From Innovation to Impact: SAP Cloud ERP Private 2025 Release (SAP News Center)
  • SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition Community
  • Help Portal SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
  • What`s New for Joule Capabilities
  • SAP Roadmap Explorer for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
  • SAP Business Suite Product Expert Training 2025

We at Cloud ERP Product Success offer a service as versatile as our product itself. Check out the numerous offerings our team has created for you below:

entry.title: Exploring Business Partner Master Data with SAP Joule, the AI Co-pilot
entry.content:
In today’s ever-evolving business landscape, quick access to business partners and their specific details is crucial for success. But this can be tedious and time-consuming when you have a lot of master data objects, especially when you want to quickly fetch some specific information related to a section of the master data without having to open the FIORI app and click through multiple facets in the user interface to locate the required information.

With the latest update of SAPJoule in October 2025, Business Partner master data brings you the power of AI. With Joule's robust functionality, you can easily access and view detailed information about your Business Partners, enhancing your ability to make informed decisions and streamline operations. This blog post explores how Joule can become your go-to assistant for easily accessing Business Partners efficiently.

 

A Closer Look at Business Partners

Joule offers features that allow users to delve into various aspects of Business Partner data. With Joule, you can explore:

  • Overview: Quickly access a summary of key information about your Business Partners.
  • Basic Details: Review fundamental data points, including organisation title and identifying search terms.
  • Roles: Understand the roles your Business Partners fulfil and their associated descriptions.
  • Addresses: Examine details of maintained and standard addresses across regions.
  • Industries: Gain insights into the industry classifications of your Business Partners.
  • Relationships: Explore the interconnected web of relationships between your Business Partners.

 

Joule’s Requirements

Before diving into Joule's capabilities, ensure you meet the prerequisites for access. You must be assigned the business role: SAP_BR_BUPA_MASTER_SPECIALIST to leverage Joule.

 

Practical Use Cases for Business Partners

Display Business Partner Overview

Kickstart your exploration by asking Joule to show you an overview of a Business Partner. For instance, entering the Joule prompt, "Display Business Partner Overview" followed by specifying an ID such as “10238179”, will yield an informative card with essential details like Full Name, Business Partner ID, Category, and Communication Details.

 

Joule knows what else you might need

You read that right! Joule right away brings up the relevant supported details of the business partner in the form of quick links.

 

All that you must do is click any of the navigational links to view the corresponding details of the business partner. Everything in the same conversation window with Joule!

Joule also provides you with the navigation to the app where the business partner is stored. With just a click, you can open the object to view all its details or edit it to make changes.

Now let’s speed up things. What if you don’t want to go step by step. You know the business partner's number, and you quickly want to view some specific information. Well, Joule does that too!

 

Dive into Basic Details

To uncover foundational insights, ask Joule, "Show me basic data of business partner 10238179." This query retrieves critical information, including Authorization Group and Archiving Flags.

Unveiling Roles

Discover the various roles a Business Partner plays in your organisation by requesting Joule to "Display roles of business partner 10238179." Learn about the roles, their descriptions, and their validity periods.

 

Navigating Addresses

Addresses are pivotal in maintaining smooth communication. By querying "Display addresses of business partner 10238179," you can access all address entries and their specifics, ensuring that communication remains seamless.

Industry Insights

To understand the industry dynamics, ask Joule to “For BP 10238179, show me industry details”. This reveals the Business Partner’s industry designations and systems.

Exploring Relationships

The intricate network of relationships is crucial for operational success. Joule can help display all related business partners by querying "Display relationship of BP 10238179," providing insights into all maintained relationships. Furthermore, for each related business partner, Joule reveals the Relationship Category, validity, and associated fields based on the relationship category.

 

Practical Use Cases for Customer Master Data

Display Customer Overview

Initiate your exploration of customer master data by querying an overview. Simply start with "Show me customers overview," and specify a Customer ID such as “1007885” for detailed insights. Joule retrieves essential information like full name, Customer ID, and contact details.

 

It works the same way as that of Business Partner. Quick links help you fetch more relevant details about the Customer master data.

 

Navigate Customer Information

Dive further with specific queries like, "Show me customer information for 1023060," to uncover details such as account group, authorization group, order block, and classification indicators.

Exploring Sales Area Dynamics

To view a customer’s sales area specifics, ask Joule, "Display sales area of customer 1023060." For further exploration into individual sales areas, a query such as "Display sales area details of customer 1023060 with sales area 1010 10 00" reveals insights like sales office locations, shipping condition, and payment terms.

Tax Data Delve

Tax considerations are crucial. By querying, "Display tax data of customer 1023060 with sales area 1010 10 00," you can access location-specific tax classifications and descriptions.

 

Financial Engagement: Company Code and Dunning

Explore financial coordination by asking Joule for company code details, with queries like "Display company code of customer 1023060." At the same time, examining dunning data can optimize collections – “Display dunning data of customer 1023060 with company code 4040" provides detailed procedural insights.

 

Conclusion

With this update, you can leverage Joule to access Business Partner and Customer objects. You can soon expect Joule for Supplier objects too.

Empower your business with Joule's capabilities and streamline your operations by effectively accessing Business Partner information. Whether it’s for ensuring precise communication or gaining industry insights, Joule stands ready to assist.

Embark on your journey with Joule today and redefine how you effectively access business partner and customer master data for success.

entry.title: UX and application development with AI at ASUG Tech Connect 2025 a companion event to SAP TechEd
entry.content:
This year, SAP TechEd has several options to allow you to learn about the latest SAP technologies and how to apply them to your organization. In addition to TechEd in Berlin and the virtual option, there are “SAP TechEd On Tour” events in Louisville, Sydney, and Bangalore. In this post, I’ll share the sessions on application development and user experience that we are presenting at ASUG Tech Connect in Louisville, Kentucky. As you would expect many have AI -assisted capabilities to make both business users and developers more productive.

 

At ASUG Tech Connect, we have both lectures and hands-on workshops.

Lectures are a chance to hear from SAP experts and have your questions answered in the room.

Extensibility with ABAP Cloud and AI in SAP Cloud ERP (Jens Weiler)
Explore on-stack key user and developer tools in the ABAP Cloud development model, now enhanced with generative AI. Extend standard apps and manage custom ones in SAP Cloud ERP and explore transactional, analytical, and integration use cases like the extensibility AI assistant, queries for analytical SAP Fiori apps, and SQL services.
Tuesday, November 4, 2025, 11:15 AM-12:05 PM

What’s Next: AI-First Innovations in SAP Cloud ERP and SAP Business Suite (Ullas Holla, Peter Spielvogel)
Get a fast-paced look at how SAP is embedding AI and delivering cross-suite innovations that break down silos and speed up decision-making. We’ll cover the latest highlights from releases of SAP Cloud ERP and SAP Business Suite—plus give you a sneak peek at what’s coming in 2026 and beyond.
Tuesday, November 4, 2025, 3:30 PM-4:20 PM

Customer Show and Tell: From CDS View to Fiori Launchpad: Full-Stack Development with Eclipse ADT with Naturipe (Brian Galloway, Dario Cruz)
This session covers the end-to-end development workflow in the RISE with SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Private Edition environment using Eclipse ABAP Development Tools (ADT). It demonstrates how to define a data source and expose it via a CDS view, enabling consumption through SAP Fiori elements, Eclipse ADT, and Postman. A live demo illustrates the creation of a simple SAPUI5 application that consumes the same OData service and is deployed to the SAP Fiori Launchpad, showcasing full-stack integration from backend data modeling to frontend delivery.
Wednesday, November 5, 2025, 8:00 AM-9:30 AM

Using Generative AI to Accelerate SAP Fiori App Development (Ullas Holla)
AI changes everything, especially for developing business applications. See how SAP’s latest coding agents let you build SAP Fiori elements apps using a conversational interface. Create apps using Joule, including a CAP service, sample data, and SAPUI5 customizations.
Wednesday, November 5, 2025, 4:10 PM-5:00 PM

Creating Better User Experiences with AI-Powered SAP Fiori Apps (Peter Spielvogel)
Discover how the latest AI features in SAP Fiori apps enhance user productivity and streamline onboarding. Starting with My Home and diving into commonly used SAP Fiori apps, see how AI simplifies information access, supports informed business decisions, and fosters seamless collaboration. Explore how conversational interactions are making SAP more intuitive than ever.
Thursday, November 6, 2025, 4:15 PM-5:05 PM

Hands-on workshops give you the opportunity to test the latest SAP innovations and gain access to the same tools and technologies we use to build apps for SAP S/4HANA.

Hands-on Lab: Get Started with ABAP Cloud for Classic ABAP Developers
Familiar with classic ABAP development? Explore how similar development works with ABAP Cloud using the ABAP RESTful application programming model. Use ABAP Cloud to build cloud-ready business apps, services, and extensions that follow clean core principles by default—on SAP Business Technology Platform and in any edition of SAP S/4HANA.
Tuesday, November 4, 2025, 1:10 PM-3:10 PM

Hands-on Lab: Explore Joule for Developers, ABAP AI Capabilities
Learn how to develop transactional applications using the ABAP RESTful application model in ABAP Cloud while leveraging Joule capabilities for ABAP developers.
Wednesday, November 5, 2025, 8:00 AM-10:00 AM

Hands-on Lab: Build On-Stack Extensions with ABAP Cloud in SAP Cloud ERP
Discover how to build extensions, applications, and services with the ABAP Cloud development model, using the ABAP RESTful application programming model and generative AI. You can explore how to extend standard SAP applications, consume public SAP APIs, and build new apps and services from scratch while getting practical insights through exercises
Wednesday, November 5, 2025, 1:00 PM-3:00 PM

Hands-on Lab: Modernize Classic Extensions for Clean Core in SAP Cloud ERP Private
Practice clean core extensibility in SAP Cloud ERP Private. Learn how to govern clean core development using the ABAP test cockpit, and how to use the ABAP Cloud development model and clean core extensibility principles to modernize your custom on-stack extensions.
Thursday, November 6, 2025, 1:00 PM-3:00 PM

Discovery Workshop: Start Your AI Agent Journey by Exploring AI Agent Use Cases 
In this discovery workshop, you will learn how AI Agents function and what makes a strong use case. You will identify and prioritize strategic AI Agent use cases for your business. For your selected use case, you will explore how AI Agent capabilities can address your specific business challenges and learn the next steps for designing and building an AI Agent using the SAP Agent Builder.
Thursday November 6, 2025, 1:00 PM-3:00 PM

I hope you can join us.

entry.title: SAP TechEd Berlin 2025 | Real-time data for AI agents: Grounding with event-driven architecture
entry.content:
A couple of words about me: 

My name is Sunny Kapoor and I am a lead product manager for the cloud integration capability of SAP Integration Suite, specializing in enterprise-wide business process integration and digital transformation. With 15 years of professional experience, I offer a comprehensive understanding of both technical implementation and strategic product oversight.

My Session: 

IN162 | Real-time data for AI agents: Grounding with event-driven architecture | Tuesday, Nov 4 | 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM CET

What you will learn about: 

This session introduces attendees to the power of event-driven integration pattern to deliver real-time grounding data, equipping AI system's with the latest business context to make informed and accurate decisions.

AI Grounding is the process of connecting an AI system's abstract knowledge and responses to specific, real-world data and context, reducing "hallucinations" and increasing the reliability and accuracy of its outputs.

 
This session focuses into the advanced realm of real-time vector grounding, where you'll connect structured enterprise data to a large language model using SAP HANA Cloud’s vector database, SAP Integration Suite, and Advanced Event Mesh. Experience firsthand how dynamic data updates can enhance the model's responses in real time, maintaining their contextual precision. By session's end, you'll have constructed an end-to-end, event-driven flow that responds to new sales order events from SAP S/4HANA Cloud and support case events from SAP Service Cloud Version 2, providing an AI assistant with live contextual intelligence. This hands-on scenario simulates an AI-powered Customer Success Digital Assistant, equipping it with real-time sales and support data to deliver accurate insights and informed decision-making capabilities.

Co-speakers:

Prashant Gautam, Senior Product Manager, has been with SAP since 2004. With strong focus on innovation, he works on advancing Artificial Intelligence capabilities in SAP Integration Suite, driving efficiency and modernisation in integration space.

 

Karsten Strothmann is lead product manager and evangelist for event-driven integration at SAP SE in Walldorf, Germany. With over 25 years of experience in the software industry, he has extensively focused on Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) and its implementation at the enterprise level.

 

Piyush Gakhar heads the cross product management & strategy for Integration solutions such as SAP Integration Suite, API Management, Event Mesh & SAP Process Orchestration.

 

 

Take a look at our overall SAP Integration Suite sessions 👇 

https://community.sap.com/t5/sap-teched-blog-posts/shape-what-s-next-with-sap-integration-suite-at-teched-2025/ba-p/14220264 

Other related sessions I recommend:  

You can also gain some further knowledge around SAP Integration Suite and SAP Integration Suite, advanced event mesh by attending the following SAP TechEd sessions:

  • IN103 | Helping systems talk smarter with a flexible event-driven architecture
    • Deep Dive
    • When: Wednesday, Nov 5 | 2:15 PM - 3:00 PM CET
  • IN165 | Experience event-driven integration with advanced event mesh
    • Hands-on Workshop
    • When: Thursday, Nov 6 | 11:30 AM - 1:30 PM CET
  • IN160 | Empower your business through enterprise automation
    • Hands-on Workshop
    • When: Wednesday, Nov 5 | 10:30 AM - 12:30 PM CET
  • IN163 | Implement exactly once in-order delivery in SAP Integration Suite
    • Hands-on Workshop
    • When: Wednesday, Nov 5 | 3:30 PM - 5:30 PM CET

Related community topic pages: 

  •  SAP Integration Suite
  • Joule 

Looking forward to seeing you: 

Join to learn how event-driven integration patterns can keep AI systems contextually aware and up-to-date with the latest business information.

Now let’s hear from you:

We’d love to hear your thoughts on the concept of real-time data grounding using evet-driven architecture. Share your insights and ideas by answering these questions in the comments below:

  • In what ways do you think real-time vector grounding can enhance the capabilities of AI Agents.
  • How do you plan to apply the skills and knowledge gained from this workshop to your ongoing or future projects?

Let's start a conversation and learn from each other's perspectives! 

Don't forget to register for the workshop to secure your spot and join us for this hands-on learning experience!

entry.title: SAP TechEd 2025: Your Must-Attend Sessions on SAP BTP
entry.content:
It feels like I came back from SAP Connect just yesterday, but SAP TechEd is now less than two weeks away. In addition to the virtual event, SAP TechEd 2025 will be held in five different cities and offer hundreds of sessions. Here’s my guide to the must-attend sessions for AI agents, SAP Business Technology Platform architecture, Extensions, and Integration across the world, as well as Virtual.

 

Why SAP TechEd 2025 is Unmissable

The enterprise technology landscape is evolving at breakneck speed, and SAP TechEd 2025 promises to be the defining moment where cutting-edge innovation meets hands-on expertise. This is the leading event for developers and IT professionals ready to explore SAP's most transformative technologies and emerge with skills that deliver measurable impact from day one.

SAP TechEd

  • SAP TechEd Berlin (November 4-6, 2025) offers the flagship in-person experience where you'll connect directly with SAP experts, participate in hands-on workshops, and build lasting professional relationships within the global SAP community
  • SAP TechEd Virtual (November 4-6, 2025) provides the same high-quality technical content online for free for maximum accessibility, allowing you to explore the latest innovations in application development, integration, data, and AI from anywhere in the world

SAP TechEd on Tour

The SAP TechEd on Tour series delivers localized, immersive experiences tailored to regional technical communities. Each event combines the core SAP TechEd experience with region-specific insights, local expert networks, and formats optimized for different technical communities and career advancement goals.

  • ASUG Tech Connect in Louisville, KY (November 4-6) focuses on practical skills for North American practitioners
  • Mastering SAP in Sydney, Australia (November 12-14) brings together Asia-Pacific technical experts for intensive learning and networking
  • SAP TechEd on Tour Bangalore, India (November 25-26) offers hands-on workshops and certification boot camps designed for the thriving Indian developer community
  • DSAG TechXchange 2026 in Hamburg, Germany (March 19) provides specialized DevOps-focused sessions for European technical professionals

 

Must-Attend Sessions at SAP TechEd 2025

Don't miss these carefully curated sessions that will give you the deepest insights into SAP's technology roadmap and hands-on skills you can immediately apply. Here are my top recommendations for SAP TechEd Berlin, Virtual, and ASUG Tech Connect, organized by city and focus area:

SAP TechEd Berlin & Virtual

🏗️ Platform Strategy & Architecture

  • ST126 | Understanding our strategy for SAP BTP: The big picture: Get the executive overview of SAP's unified platform strategy directly from the Head of BTP Product Management. This is essential for understanding how all SAP technologies connect. 
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • XP100 | Accelerate adoption of SAP Business Technology Platform with confidence: Learn practical implementation approaches using SAP's Architecture Center and Discovery Center resources. Perfect for planning your BTP adoption strategy. 
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

🤖 AI & AI Agents

  • AD202 | Orchestrating enterprise automation with custom AI agents: Build custom AI agents from scratch in Joule Studio and integrate them with SAP Build Process Automation. Features real customer use cases from Uniper Energy
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • AD819 | What's new for process automation, Joule skills, and agents in SAP Build: Learn how enterprise automation is evolving from structured workflows to intelligent, autonomous experiences, and how Joule Studio supports custom skill and agent creation for AI-driven process transformation.
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • AI102 | Boosting business efficiency with AI innovations in document processing: Discover how SAP Document AI automates structured and unstructured document processing with cutting-edge AI technologies. 
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • AI105 | Building custom AI agents and skills with Joule Studio: You can learn how to create, deploy, and manage agents tailored to your business needs—featuring live demos and a walkthrough of key capabilities for developers and IT teams.
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • IN200 | Empower your agents to be responsible: Understand AI agent governance and security through SAP Integration Suite's API Management capabilities.
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

💻 Application Development & Automation

  • AD820 | Future of app dev in SAP Build: Simplifying clean core and LoB extensions: Get exclusive previews of upcoming SAP Build enhancements including Joule copilot integration and improved developer productivity tools. 
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • AD104 | Boost your ABAP development with SAP Joule for Developers: Learn how AI is transforming ABAP development with SAP Joule, from code acceleration to custom AI scenario development.
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • IN160 | Empower your business through enterprise automation: Get hands-on experience combining SAP Integration Suite with SAP Build and SAP Signavio solutions. Learn to create automation-based integrations powered by AI capabilities and prebuilt content to drive process innovation.
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN

 🔗 Integration

  • IN100 | Make your enterprise future ready with SAP Integration Suite: Essential for anyone migrating from SAP PI/PO to SAP Integration Suite. Covers tools, best practices, and technical challenges with real-world insights. 
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

🔒 Security & Compliance

  • XP802 | Road map for security and compliance services in SAP BTP: Stay ahead of security requirements with upcoming BTP security features, identity management, and compliance enhancements. 
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • ST104 | Unlocking value with the multi-cloud foundation for SAP BTP: Learn about platform administration, custom application lifecycle management, and SAP BTP’s business focus for enterprise-grade, hybrid landscapes.
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN

  • XP207 | Mastering zero trust: SAP Customer Identity and Access Management: Use policies and tools in SAP Customer Identity and Access Management to protect customers’ accounts and access while delivering zero trust—ready applications.
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN

 

ASUG Tech Connect - Louisville, KY

🏗️ Platform Strategy & Architecture

  • Introduction to SAP Business Technology Platform: Get a complete overview of SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) to explore the full potential of the platform. 🗓️READ NOW

  • Hands-on Lab: Accelerate adoption of SAP Business Technology Platform with confidence: Gain hands-on experience in accelerating your adoption of SAP BTP with SAP Discovery Center, a single point of entry for BTP and Business AI knowledge assets. 🗓️READ NOW

🤖AI & AI Agents

  • AI-Powered Document Automation: Accelerate SAP Processes with Confidence: We will share real-world examples of global companies using SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) to streamline document processing, improve data accuracy, and achieve measurable results in a matter of weeks. 🗓️READ NOW

  • Hands-on Lab: Build Your Own AI Solution with the Generative AI Hub: Get hands-on experience building a custom AI solution with the generative AI hub capability in AI Foundation. 🗓️READ NOW

  • Hands-on Lab: Get Hands-on Experience to Extend Joule and Build AI Agents: Get hands-on experience with Joule Studio to extend Joule technology with custom skills and build AI agents. 🗓️READ NOW

  • Extend Joule with Custom Skills and Custom Agents for SAP Cloud ERP: Get maximum value from the Joule copilot in SAP Cloud ERP by extending it with custom-built skills and intelligent agents that can plan, act, and execute tasks. 🗓️READ NOW       

  • Discovery Workshop: Start Your AI Agent Journey by Exploring AI Agent Use Cases: Explore how AI Agent capabilities can address your specific business challenges and learn the next steps for designing and building an AI Agent using the SAP Agent Builder. 🗓️READ NOW          

 💻 Application Development & Automation

  • SAP Build: Latest Innovations and Road Map: Explore the strategic road map for the SAP Build portfolio and see how recent and upcoming innovations in low-code and pro-code tools are transforming application development, process automation, and business site design. 🗓️READ NOW

  • Introduction to Application Development and Automation: Learn how the key capabilities, recent innovations, and road map for SAP’s application development and automation solutions enable you to build, extend, and automate apps quickly. 🗓️READ NOW

 🔗 Integration

  • Introduction to Integration: Harness AI to Future-Proof Your Integration Investment: Essential for anyone migrating from SAP PI/PO to SAP Integration Suite. Covers tools, best practices, and technical challenges with real-world insights. 🗓️READ NOW

  • ASUG Community Conversations- SAP Integration in SAP Business Technology Platform: Connect with SAP experts and the ASUG Community as they share their experiences, solutions, and strategies. 🗓️READ NOW

  • Innovations, Investments, and Future Road Map for SAP Integration Suite: Explore recent innovations across API management, event-driven architecture, B2B integration, hybrid deployment models, and AI-driven automation. 🗓️READ NOW

 🔒 Security & Compliance

  • Explore Security Services with SAP BTP: Explore the extensive capabilities of SAP BTP in security, identity, and access management. 🗓️READ NOW

 

Register. Attend. Reap Results.

The sessions above represent hours of curated content distilled into the most impactful learning opportunities to deliver technical knowledge at SAP TechEd 2025. You'll get architecture frameworks, implementation strategies, and direct access to the platform's subject matter experts. Whether you're migrating integrations, deploying AI agents, or hardening security, these sessions answer your actual questions. And of course, you can't miss the keynotes at SAP TechEd to explore how SAP's newest technologies and capabilities will bring in results:

SAP TechEd - Berlin & Virtual

  • KEY100 | Beyond the hype: How SAP is supercharging developers for what's next: Explore how the latest technology, tools, AI, agents, and learning from SAP can help you adapt to these changing roles. 
    🗓️ADD NOW – BERLIN | 🗓️ADD NOW – VIRTUAL

  • KEY101 | Draft day for developers: Turning new technology into real-world wins: Explore how you can use SAP’s newest AI capabilities, generative agents, and enhanced tooling to build faster and smarter with less friction and more impact.

 ASUG Tech Connect - Louisville, KY
